title: Time for access
creator_credit: Deborah Tennet and Wellington Polytechnic Photographic Students Production
brief_description: Follows a day in the lives of Michael, a paraplegic and Jane who is visually impaired as they meet to prepare for a concert performance. Shows them engaged in normal everyday activities, rather than focusing on their disabilities.
creator_credit_for_label: Deborah Tennet and Wellington Polytechnic Photographic Students Production
